last_episode_to_air.name: Omen Cat
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hippos that solve crimes ripped from the headlines; a cheetah haunted by everyone it ever ate; a snake celebrates its 30th birthday alone; a creepy looking cat.

name: When Nature Calls with Helen Mirren
original_name: When Nature Calls with Helen Mirren
overview: Helen Mirren narrates this comedy series that looks at the lighter side of the natural world.

episodes.name: Let's Begin at the Beginning
episodes.overview: Helen Mirren narrates a documentary examination of the animal kingdom, featuring a supermodel lemur, a thousand-year-old fairy fish trying to find someone in 2021 who wants to make a wish, the new hit game show “Wolf or Rock” and a crab who writes erotic fiction.

episodes.name: Sup?
episodes.overview: Featuring a field mouse who is killing it with non-fungible tokens, a divorced bear gym teacher whose students have heard gossip about his private life, a dragonfly movie star who can’t take direction and a beetle named Tony with anger management issues.

episodes.name: Dastardly Death Gunk Stuff
episodes.overview: An otter mom has a few too many on her first night out after having a baby; a bear and monkey attempt to get out of an escape room; a socially awkward turkey struggles to fit in at a party; a ground squirrel has a terrible secret.

episodes.name: A Partial In-Ground Pool
episodes.overview: A judgmental flamingo; a groundhog who thinks a snake is his friend Steve; words of wisdom from Matthew McOtterhey; a searing Mantis love triangle

episodes.name: My Jingle Balls
episodes.overview: A rabbit attacks a water buffalo; a celebrity bear tries to answer interview questions while eating increasingly prickly cacti; a falcon wearing yoga pants.

episodes.name: Nature's Justice
episodes.overview: A deer who can't stop dropping her famous friends' names; a clown fish who has been cheating with her tennis instructor; a pit-fighting owl called "The Pit Fighter"; a deep examination revealing the plural of moose.

episodes.name: Uncle Antelope’s Truth Bombs
episodes.overview: Animals stuck on a never-ending video call; etiquette lessons for elephants; a squirrel that hosts a home-shopping program is stalked by a deranged viewer; a searing expose on lizards that horde.

episodes.name: The Burger Hole
episodes.overview: Penguins doing CrossFit; Janice Rams fighting over a hummus recipe; a nearsighted eagle reports on the traffic; unpopular wolf opinions.

episodes.name: The Optimistic Mosquito
episodes.overview: A mosquito that wants to do good in the world; a chipmunk that over-packed trying to outsmart the TSA; an old wild boar looking for love; anaconda ASMR.

episodes.name: Omen Cat
episodes.overview: Hippos that solve crimes ripped from the headlines; a cheetah haunted by everyone it ever ate; a snake celebrates its 30th birthday alone; a creepy looking cat.
